# Repel Ectoplasm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Ectomancy Spells|ectomancy]]]

**Level:** [[Ghost (Domain)|Ghost 7]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 60 ft.

**Area:** 60-ft. line-shaped emanation from you

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Ghostwalk (WotC)­, pg. 57

As *[[Repel Wood (Spell)|repel wood]]**,* but affecting only ectoplasm, whether inert or part of an ectoplasmic creature. Large manifestations of ectoplasm (such as a *[[Wall of Ectoplasm (Spell)|wall of ectoplasm]]* spell) are not considered “fixed firmly” for the purpose of this spell and are pushed back by the waves of energy.
